overview:
Ari Lewine is Chief Strategy Officer and Co-Founder of TripleLift - a content amplification platform that uses image recognition technology to identify brands’ most compelling images.

Prior to founding TripleLift, Ari was head of Global Performance Sales at AppNexus where he led the sales and account management teams for direct response focused ad networks and advertisers.

Previously, Ari led Business Development at Oyster.com - a hotel review site backed by the Travel Channel.

Prior to Oyster.com, Ari was CEO of University Trucking a 125 person shipping and storage company and the largest student owned and operated business in the U.S. University Trucking was sold in 2009 and continues to operate successfully today.
